long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to DAWN!

Download the extension and create an account to participate as a node in the DAWN Network through proof of bandwidth validation. Proof of bandwidth verifies the availability and reliability of bandwidth resources as advertised by DAWN operators.

Stay connected through the extension to earn rewards: boost your rewards by referring friends and participating as a validator (coming soon!).
